inputs.name: orchestratorConnection
inputs.label: Orchestrator connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: A service connection to the Orchestrator instance onto which we will deploy/update the assets.

inputs.name: folderName
inputs.label: Orchestrator folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder to deploy to. If empty, then Global will be used.

inputs.name: assetActionType
inputs.label: Choose asset action
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can deploy new assets only once so if the assets already exist you must use update to set new values.

inputs.name: csvFile
inputs.label: Assets CSV File
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The CSV File containing the new assets that will be created. Use the file format shown in the example below!

name,type,value
example_asset1,text,value of the asset
example_asset2,integer,4232
example_asset3,boolean,false
example_asset4,credential,username::password

For the update the same format is used but the type isn't needed, so it can be left empty.
